Review_title: If you play in the mountains, you should watch this
Review_Text: I was a little leery that the filmmakers might choose to concentrate on the high-profile parts, but this turned out not to be an issue. It is very well done and (for me) captures the right mix of action, background, and personal stories. They cover all aspects of SAR, from the dangling under a helo parts, to the slogging through the mud and undergrowth parts, to the impact on personal lives.I know SAR people, and this is an excellent depiction of these dedicated people who go out into the bush to save others on their own time, and often on their own dime.
